contact.address: No. 5, 2nd Cross, Anna Street, Sholinganallur, Chennai-600119

objective: Results-driven professional with 4 years and 11 months of experience, including 1 year in the mechanical engineering domain and 3 years 11 months in the IT field as a Full Stack Developer. Adept at building high-performance web and mobile applications, optimizing APIs, and leveraging cloud services to deliver scalable and secure digital solutions.

keyPoints: Hello! I'm Karthick Sekar, a Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering graduate with diverse experience spanning mechanical and IT fields.
In the IT domain, I specialize in creating scalable, secure, and user-friendly applications by leveraging frameworks like Angular, React, and .NET Core.
I bring strong expertise in backend integration, cloud solutions, and IoT systems, consistently focusing on quality and security.
With a results-driven approach, I thrive in delivering impactful solutions and learning new technologies.
